title: Even Adcs don't understand the items they buy.

This made me think of how much I miss the days of Homeguard Mobis rush Rammus. Rolling down midlane for a gank at 7 minutes with 900 movespeed was literally the best thing ever.

>
> This made me think of how much I miss the days of Homeguard Mobis rush Rammus. Rolling down midlane for a gank at 7 minutes with 900 movespeed was literally the best thing ever.

You can still do it if you get teleport and ghost, 20 min in the game. If you get Mobis, max movement speed, get 3 stacks of cloud drake, get elder to buff the stacks, be 20 min in game, have teleport, have ghost, and have your q ready, you are basically untouchable, i recommend getting dead mans plate for being able to go anywhere and warmongs to regenerate your hp

He's having trouble banning Nami tho.

you know what.. you do you bro.

I had a vayne buy runans hurricane once..

> [{quoted}](name=TheFrozenChosen,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WTaZwXX2,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-08-23T18:00:02.106+0000)
>
> I had a vayne buy runans hurricane once..

Ouch.  I have seen it too unfortunately.
I think runans on vayne doesnt fuck up the silver bolts. The rings will only be applied to the primary target.

yes, but its still a sub par item. i get attack speed is important on vayne to proc silver bolts as much as possible, but there are FAR better items to use. BotRK, Phantom Dancer, Stattik Shiv... hell Tri Force would be a far superior buy to Ruunans.

Depends, really. I won't really say it's subpar on any champion if you go for an AD + crit build because you're still getting big crits on several targets with each attack, though it's definitely suboptimal on her since she mostly just wants to bulk up and get attack speed to rely on Silver Bolts instead of grabbing damage.

> [{quoted}](name=TheThomTanksWell,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WTaZwXX2,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-08-23T20:48:52.927+0000)
>
> Ouch.  I have seen it too unfortunately.

There is nothing bad about building Runaan's on Vayne. It doesn't mess up her silver bolts because those only apply to the main target, and it gives her attack speed, crit, an on hit effect, and a little aoe.

> [{quoted}](name=Thezanman,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WTaZwXX2,comment-id=000400000001,timestamp=2016-08-25T14:11:31.837+0000)
>
> There is nothing bad about building Runaan's on Vayne. It doesn't mess up her silver bolts because those only apply to the main target, and it gives her attack speed, crit, an on hit effect, and a little aoe.

Except that Static Shiv accomplishes much more for vayne than Hurricane ever could.  Why build something that was designed to apply on hits to multiple targets if you have nothing that works with it?  Yes it "works" on Vayne, Liandry's Torment works on Dr. Mundo, but you dont see many Mundo(I did not forget to pluralize that, I just feel like Mundo himself would say the plural of Mundo is Mundo) running around witrh Liandry's, because there is better options available that work in a more effecient way with his kit.  Personally, I do not think she needs AoE, she was designed as ranged duelist and as such a Firecannon suits her better to increase her range albeit very small time frame.

> [{quoted}](name=TheThomTanksWell,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WTaZwXX2,comment-id=0004000000010000,timestamp=2016-08-25T20:46:08.399+0000)
>
> Except that Static Shiv accomplishes much more for vayne than Hurricane ever could.  Why build something that was designed to apply on hits to multiple targets if you have nothing that works with it?  Yes it "works" on Vayne, Liandry's Torment works on Dr. Mundo, but you dont see many Mundo(I did not forget to pluralize that, I just feel like Mundo himself would say the plural of Mundo is Mundo) running around witrh Liandry's, because there is better options available that work in a more effecient way with his kit.  Personally, I do not think she needs AoE, she was designed as ranged duelist and as such a Firecannon suits her better to increase her range albeit very small time frame.

Still miles better than building rabadon's deathcap. It's such a small disadvantage and the on hit physical damage probably outdamages statikk shiv or rfc.

To be fair, there isn't a great deal of consistency on what does and doesn't work with hurricane. There isn't much to suggest it doesn't work so I can see why people would buy it.
